Content.Text:
<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, why hello there <MYNAME>. It's good to see
you. Please, come in and sit a while.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, those dirty dishes in the sink? Don't worry,
I'll get to them later.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you, dearie. That was very sweet of you.
Come, come. Have a seat, now.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I've been so achy lately that I've been putting off
chores I normally do without a second thought.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Going outside is even more effort, and you know
there's plenty to be done out there. Goodness,
getting old is such a bother!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, no. It's all right. I know my body inside and
out. 
<PAGE>
Don't worry, I'm still in good enough shape that
I'll be around for years to come, oho ho!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
But I do feel more secure with you as my
neighbor, dearie.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I know that if something should ever happen,
you'll take good care of my farm for me.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I shouldn't talk about such things, you say? Oho
ho...well, I can see how you'd find them
disagreeable.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Thank you for being so concerned about this old
woman, dear. Chatting with you brightens my
day, sure as the sun.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now then, I'd best get up and do some cleaning
while my joints are feeling up to it!
